DESCRIPTION: While traveling in Grand Gaia, cooperating with friends and with a powerful goddess, a Summoner faces off against demons in fierce battles.
Ishgria, the land of sealed demons abandoned by the gods. It is here where the Summoner faces even more powerful demons in glorious battles.
“召喚術の源となる力”を求め、様々な異界を巡る召喚師たち。召喚の力が乱れる中で、新たな戦いが繰り広げられる……！！
SP_CAT_NAME: 旅の記憶　破絆の封神編

DESCRIPTION: Guided by Tilith, who serves the god Lucius, the Summoner starts a great adventure. The Four Fallen Gods must be defeated, starting with Maxwell.
An island once inhabited by giants seems to be this Summoner's next stop. However, the Imperial Guard's Paris is also headed towards Cordelica...
The Summoner arrives to the land Cardes the Malevolent seeks to destroy. A new battle commences where the legendary 4 Heroes of Palmyna once stood.
Paris arrives to the island of the ancient La Veda Republic to search for a rumored gate, but the Summoners' Hall has already begun investigation.
Zevalhua the Supreme must be slain before he destroys everything. He is said to be in a quarrel with Afla Dilith, one of the Four Fallen Gods.
This verdant region where the Vriksha Duchy once flourished becomes the setting for the Summoner's battle with the fiercest opponent yet, Afla Dilith.
The Summoners head to Atharva to halt the Imperial Guard's rebellion. They search for the rebel leader Eriole, but fate's wheels begin turning...
Lucius awaits in Bariura. What truths could Tilith and Ark be ready to shed light on before the Summoners?
The Summoner arrives to Ishgria, the land of the sealed demons. Grahdens, who had been waiting there for some time, mentions he has a new assistant...
After facing the War Demon Shusui, the Summoner reaches Lem, the second region of Ishgria. What could be awaiting the Summoner in this new land?
After meeting up with Seria and Lugina, the Summoner travels beyond Lem towards Beiorg, at Tilith's request.
巨大な花が一際目を惹くイシュグリア東部の大陸ウルジ。カルのことが気掛かりな召喚師は、次の地へと歩みを進める。
異界や人間の技術に興味を持つ魔神モルデリムの支配する地ラクシュルト。様々な見慣れぬ施設が召喚師の行く手に現れる。
断崖に横たわる大巨人の躯が目を惹くザームブルグの地。この地を支配する魔神アム＝ユノスは最古の魔神だと言われている。
竜の力を持つ魔神が治めるという土地ファル・ナーガ。繁栄の面影を残すこの場所には、召喚師の親友が待ち受けている。
モーラを追ってやってきたエストリア。この地にはかつて魔神たちの築いた最古の国家があったと言われている。
この地はカルナ・マスタの破壊の痕跡の残る場所であり、同時にカルナ・マスタの本体が封印された土地でもある。
かつてイシュグリアの覇権を目指した王が拠点とした地。ここには大神皇の魂と真の力が封印されているという。
特殊技術が発達した異界「ベクタス」でルジーナを捜す召喚師とティリス。召喚術が上手く使えない中、新たな冒険が始まる…。
雪と氷に覆われた異界「ヴィランシル」。この世界もまた封神儀の暴走により、崩壊へ向かっているのかもしれない。
独特の文化を持つ世界「凰刃那原」。セリアと合流した召喚師はこの世界でどのような味方、そして敵と出会うのか？
人間の痕跡が無いにも関わらず、巨大な建造物が点在する異界。建造物は朽ちてはおらず、何者かによる手入れの跡が見られる。
巨竜たちが闊歩する世界「ヴァルドロア」。最後の封神儀…封神竜のもとへ向かう召喚師たちを待ち受けるものは果たして……？
アベル機関残党のギャレットとメルの命を狙うベルツ。召喚師はグラデンスより密命を受け、彼らのもとへ急ぐが……。
Tilith sheds light on the Four Fallen Gods and the situation in Grand Gaia. Before heading to Morgan, the next destination is the Tower of Mistral.
While Karl goes after the demon Graham, the Summoner seeks to challenge Maxwell's disciple, Abaddon. But can Abaddon really be defeated?
The land under Creator Maxwell's jurisdiction is the new destination. The goal is to head towards Maxwell's stronghold, St. Lamia Palace, with Tilith.
The Summoner touches down where the great Amdahl Empire once prospered. Tilith expects this journey to end in Cardes the Malevolent's defeat.
According to Tilith, this land was once witness to a human civil war. Intense battles begin breaking out in the midst of the wilderness.
Palmyna, where Cardes is sealed, is the next step. However, many lost souls and demons still lurk about after the great war with the gods...
Zevalhua the Supreme has become the new target. Tilith mentions that she is afraid a plot may be afoot.
The land where an empire once stood tall is now visited by the Summoner. Grahdens has entrusted you and Lugina with Karl's rescue, but...
Having finally reached Zevalhua's stronghold, it's time for this old battlefield to give way for a new fight to rescue a captured Grahdens.
After the destruction of the last Fallen God, Afla Dilith, Tilith and her Summoner set off on a new journey in lands unknown.
After touching down in the land where the Vriksha Duchy once flourished, Zurg's words make Tilith feel very unlike her bubbly self...
Afla Dilith awaits in Aldahlia. Though Tilith gets a really eerie feeling from Afla Dilith's presence, she still has full faith in her Summoner.
The Summoner is asked to venture into a newly discovered and mysterious land. However, the enemies waiting there prove a lot stronger than imagined...
A demonic "shadow" found in one of Ishgria's regions. Why would demons create such a thing? And what is the purpose of these "shadows"?
The Arena is a place where Summoners can use their skills to earn a rank promotion. Nonetheless, there are those who don't take it very seriously...
Many demons have been appearing recently, so the ban on Demon Slayer missions has been lifted. Summoners can now challenge the strongest opponents!
Decades of unmitigated warfare among the guilds of Orebus have resulted in a devastated landscape.
It is said that the Grand Quest System built by the Akras Summoners' Hall Survey Office allows one to experience the same adventure in numerous ways.
The Grand Quest System allows Summoners to relive any adventures already experienced in different lands, facing off against gods and demons alike...
The Grand Quest System grants Summoners the opportunity to go on adventures with ancient heroes, helping to reveal history's most famous mysteries...
Grand Quests: Global
Karl asks the Summoner for some help with defeating a certain dragon. This particular beast is quick to flee, so they try a pincer attack, but...
Lugina and the Summoner search for the Empress's treasure hidden within the Great Tree of Life. However, Paris is also after the treasure herself.
Seria and Karl ask the Summoner for help with defeating the demon Graham. However, Graham has several traps in store for them...
After learning of the demon Algmos's sighting, Seria ignores orders from Summoners' Hall and pursues the demon. Now the Summoner must bring her back.
Grahdens asks the Summoner for help with defeating the demon Mashreed. However, a number of other demons seem to be lurking in the area as well...
Lin asks the Summoner for help with conducting some land surveys in a region connected to Grand Gaia. Lots of monsters start showing up though, and...
Paris visits a strange land upon Noel's request, and the Summoner goes in the same direction. Going their separate ways they run into unexpected foes.
Lugina and the Summoner set off to defeat a demon, all according to Noel's plan. However, Lugina is then forced to fight a demon that resembles him.
エリーゼ、リム、セラがピクニックに向かうエイブ山に魔神が出現。ノアと召喚師は、急いで彼女たちの救出に向かうが……。
Cardes the Malevolent invades the Kingdom of Palmyna. Princess Edea and her comrades, along with the Royal Army, fight until the very end, but...
Edea falls into a deep sleep in order to seal away Cardes. Having been transported to different regions, Edea's friends gather anew to save her.
Michele, who lives in the La Veda Republic, happens upon Duel-GX. Together, they set out on a journey to defeat Duel-GX's target, Melchio.
異界イシュグリアへ魔神討伐に向かう神衛使メイリスたち。だが道中で大神皇の危機を知り急遽、隊を２つに分けるが…。
イシュグリア調査の先遣隊として、現地に出発する魔神討伐隊隊長７人。だがそこは彼らの想像を遥かに超えた場所だった…。
神と人間の大戦末期、リードたちは生き残った人々を救うため、ミストラルにあるとされる約束の地を目指すが……。
神々との大戦末期、バリウラ帝国が神軍の猛攻により滅亡の危機を迎える中、第一皇子シリウスはある決断を迫られる……。
A place where Summoners can train for battle by setting certain settings and conditions.
Strange singularities tend to happen within the Vortex. These curious glitches allow the Summoners to share adventures with beings from other worlds.
ゲートの狭間を探索する召喚師の前に、異界の冒険者たちが現れる。召喚師は迷い込んだ彼らの帰還に協力することにした。
SP_CAT_NAME: リアフィースの戦士たち

DESCRIPTION: Relive the saga of the Soul-Bound heroes as they battle with Gazia to discover the truth behind his schemes!
Join the team as they search for Ezra to get him back safely. Time to zoom-zoom!
Our heroes from Galardhon finally make it into the heart of the enemy fortress. But when reality breaks, everything can go wrong.
Ensa-Taya chases Juno-Seto into the world of Aimyhr, bringing tragedy and conflict with them.
The saga of Aimyhr enters its final act.
It's dangerous to stare into the Void… for it might stare back.
When the universe ends, your only solace lies in how quick it comes.
Meet Fei and Fang, lovers who have fallen under the shadow of an evil witch!
A madman has come to Grand Gaia to crush his enemies in a blood-soaked tournament.
New friends have arrived, searching for the one known as Veritas. The shadows deepen...
In the wake of disaster, two strangers find out about who they are - and what the holidays mean to them.
An old enemy has returned to menace Fei and Fang anew! Will they overcome the challenge?
Carrol returns this Easter and she's on the hunt for Easter Eggs! But who's that robot?
Three serendipitous souls starring in a tale of sacrifice, perseverance and merry endings.
MHA Collaboration - Izuku and Ochaco Appears!
In this BFxTG collaboration, watch Touka Kirishima and Ken Kaneki battle their foes, Yamori and Shu Tsukiyama!
Sennie and Chryssa: Road trip!
Can this unlikely duo, Feora, a moody, teenaged beastkin and Hyshka, an aspirant of the Old Ways, bridge the cultural gap to solve the woes of the woods?
Long-deceased noblewoman Lydia is looking forward to the annual homecoming festival of The Return, but this year, a strange new visitor has hopped into the city…
In this BFxSC collaboration, Jin, Mugen and Fuu face off against Shoryu once again!
The greatest changes start with the smallest tweaks.
Untold tales stretching across time and space.
Commander. Husband. Father. King.
Devised by Noel, Frontier Rifts allow Summoners to explore unstable worlds formed by experimenting with time itself.
MHA Collaboration - Tsuyu, Bakugo and All Might!
It is said that every autumn in Aimyhr, a moon fairy descends upon the land to revel among the mortals during the annual Harvest Festival.
Accepting a request of a client, a strange beak-masked man greets you. What looms ahead in the huge mansion behind him?
Fairy Tail 2nd Collaboration - The cast of Fairy Tail returns, alongside with some unexpected company!
How well do you know about the lore of Brave Frontier? Find out with this trivia game, hosted by Rizky and Shaly!
Legend has it that during this festive season of the land, a spirit will whisk away naughty children and adults alike. Is this legend true?
Join the military android Galene and the scrappy techpunk Vektor as a flourishing relationship between human and robot unfolds in the grip of the sinister Corporation!
Join Marianne and Auberi on their journey to discover the fabled Rainbow Crystal!
The worlds of BRAVE FRONTIER and THE KING OF FIGHTERS will clash once more! It's time to crack those knuckles and stretch those muscles!
Evil has not ceased in Urzyma, despite the God-King's death.
The story of Urzyma's resistance against the God-King continues.
The ultimate fate of Urzyma lies in the hands of the Vessels.
Witness the history of characters from another world.
Join Renatus, an artifact seeker, as he explores a tomb that promises treasures that cannot be measured with money.
Join Vash and friends in their adventure across Grand Gaia!
A demigod of Athensphere comes to terms with his fate in the hands of his old gods.
Two very different girls, both hailing from very different world, summoned by the mysterious Caretaker to another world. Just what could be waiting for them on the other side?
Some memories are better left untouched in the hazy darkness of a mind bent on ancestral vengeance.
The lost tale of an Urzyma godling's death and rebirth.
A series of harrowing logs on what transpired in the 13th Correctional Facility following an incident.
Beautiful memories in azure blue of your impromptu vacation to Starfall Island.
A record of a strange memory you don't recall having.
Recollections of the first tale in Maeri's book.
Continuations of the now-extended tale in Maeri's book.
